attributes.action: We will campaign for Devon's children & their schools to get a fair funding deal
attributes.background:
Devon County Council gained an extra £16 million for schools 2 years ago, but there is still more work to do.

Cllr John Hart and his Conservative Councillors will use their voice to make sure Devon gets its fair share of funding for every child.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.  

You may wish to sign this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177952
